attributes.action: Is The Fare fair? Reduce Travel West Midlands Bus Fares For 16-18s
attributes.additional_details:
We are Team Perham from Wave 10 of The Challenge Network.

We think that the bus fare prices for 16-18 year olds are far too extortionate on the Travel West Midlands bus services.

By signing this petition, you are campaigning to lower the bus fare prices for 16-18 year olds as they currently have to pay adult fares- introducing a suitable fare at a discounted rate for those in this category is what we propose should happen.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the relevant local authorities.
